1237030.name: Speaking Simulator Original Soundtrack
1237030.description:
Welcome to an audio experience designed specifically for human ears and brains. We have created "music" by painstakingly arranging various sounds into a rhythmically and tonally pleasing series.

Featuring all original in-game music and some bonus tracks.

This DLC contains the following lossless content:
✿ Welcome to Speaking Simulator
✿ Overworld
✿ Finding love at the human food dispensary
✿ The promotion of Blank Textfield
✿ GenericMusic
✿ Inspection of organic meat shell
✿ Bouncer
✿ Club w Karen
✿ Everybody Dance for Artificial Intelligence Because There is No Downside Whatsoever
✿ Best, man
✿ Presidential Finale
✿ Compliance
✿ Secret Bonus Rap

Musicians
Dan Sugars
Andrew Curnock (Beat Therapy)

Bonus Musician
Broadcast King
1237030.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 韩语, 俄语, 简体中文, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
